predicate.note: Frames file for 'lumber' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 51.3.2, Framenet entry Self motion.

roleset.name: move gracelessly

example.name: not path
example.text: Huge machines that [*T*-1] look as though they came from the Star Wars desert-battle scene lumber among the dunes.
example.arg: Huge machines that [*T*-1] look as though they came from the Star Wars desert-battle scene

roleset.note: Incidentally, I don't recall any desert battle scenes in Star Wars.

example.name: yes path
example.text: John watched the procession of giant gas-guzzling SUVs lumber down the road.
example.arg: the procession of giant gas-guzzling SUVs
